Service operations
===================

.. currentmodule:: rgma

These are static operations.

TupleStore
----------

.. class:: TupleStore

    A named database used by a :class:`Producer` to store tuples.

    .. automethod:: TupleStore.getLogicalName
    
    .. automethod:: TupleStore.isHistory
     
    .. automethod:: TupleStore.isLatest
